description: This file implements the Registry class within the Plugin namespace, managing application registry data including loading from a JSON file, listing entries, finding entries by ID, and updating capabilities.

classes.name: Registry
classes.description: Class managing a registry of applications, allowing loading from a JSON file, listing, searching, and updating app entries.

methods.name: bool LoadFromFile(const string & path,string & errorOut)
methods.description: Loads registry data from a specified file path, parsing JSON content into internal data structures.

methods.name: std::vector<AppRecord> List() const
methods.description: Returns a list of all registered applications.

methods.name: bool Find(const string & id,AppRecord & out) const
methods.description: Searches for an application by ID and outputs the record if found.

methods.name: bool UpdateCapabilities(const string & id,const Core::JSON::VariantContainer & caps)
methods.description: Updates the capabilities of a registered application identified by ID.
